close friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelson , she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. talkfest in the 01 February 2006 Actress and goodwill ambassador Angelina Jolie told a summit of business leaders and politicians on Friday( January 27) that she had discovered things about the United States that had made her ashamed. There are many things that as an AmEric Schmidtan I've discovered in the last few years that have shocked me about my own country that I am very ashamed by, Angelina Jolie , a goodwill ambassador for the UN refugee agency, told an audience at the World Economic Forum.
